meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slow.
meanings.sent1: Her slownesses in completing tasks often frustrated her coworkers.
meanings.sent2: The slownesses of the turtle made it easy for the rabbit to win the race.
meanings.sent3: The snail joked that its slownesses were due to having too many shells to carry around.
meanings.sent4: The slownesses of time seemed to stretch out endlessly during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent5: The slownesses of the sloth were a source of admiration for its ability to relax.

meanings.definition: The act of moving or proceeding at a low speed.
meanings.sent1: The slownesses of the traffic made him late for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the slownesses of the lazy river ride at the water park.
meanings.sent3: The slownesses of the snail race amused the onlookers as they cheered on their favorites.
meanings.sent4: The slownesses of the old car made it feel like a vintage ride through time.
meanings.sent5: The slownesses of the sloth's movements were mesmerizing to watch in the zoo.
